mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (m_id, m_pw, m_repw, m_name, m_nickname, m_tel, m_birthdate, m_gender, m_zipcode, m_address, m_addressDetail) VALUES (#{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_repw}, #{m_name}, #{m_nickname}, #{m_tel}, #{m_birthdate}, #{m_gender}, #{m_zipcode}, #{m_address}, #{m_addressDetail})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET m_pw = #{m_pw}, m_repw = #{m_repw}, m_nickname = #{m_nickname}, m_tel = #{m_tel}, m_zipcode = #{m_zipcode}, m_address = #{m_address}, m_addressdetail = #{m_addressDetail} WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.select: SELECT b.m_id, b.board_id, b.title , b.writeDate ,b.image, b.thumbnail FROM member m , board b WHERE m.m_id = b.m_id AND m.m_id = #{m_id} ORDER BY b.board_id ASC
select re.alcohole_name ,re.alcohole_image,re.alcohole_dosu,re.favor,l.m_id ,re.recipe_code from liked l, reciped_alcohole re where re.recipe_code = l.recipe_code and l.m_id = #{m_id}
select b.board_id, b.title,b.m_id, b.writedate, b.thumbnail , j.m_id from jjim j , board b where j.board_id = b.board_id and j.m_id = #{m_id} ORDER BY b.writedate ASC
